name: Revit Sample House Interactive VR for Oculus Rift S
name_original: Revit Sample House Interactive VR for Oculus Rift S
description:
Use the Oculus controls and walk around the model. The right hand index trigger will interact with doors and other items.
Us the index grip to pick up objects as well.

The right thumb controller will open up the Plan and Section drawings. The "A" button will turn them off
